name: Labyrinth Tower (Danjaman91)
description:
You play the role of a young woman called Jazlyn who wakes up at the foot of a tall, mysterious tower. You are beckoned to climb the tower and solve its puzzles and challenges along the way. Can you discover the truth behind Labyrinth Tower?

This is my first project in RPG Maker, and so I made a small game with a bunch of mazes and logic puzzles (you may have seen similar things in Zelda games or old JRPGs). Instead of jumping straight in with a full-on RPG, this small-scale project helped me to practice event scripting and map design.

There is also a light story that will reveal itself as you progress, along with some secret levels and a 'true' ending to discover.

Credit:
Yanfly (For various plugins that were used in this game: available here)
Chris Tamblin (For extensive feedback, testing and spell-checking)

Enjoy!

Dan.
